name: owo.style
description:
Run - A/D or Left/Right
Jump - W or Space or Up
Zoom - mouse wheel
Interact with map objects - E
Walk - Shift (hold)
Gesture - F2
Characters can be posed while holding F1 key

owo.stlye is an online multiplayer game, consisting of the following modes:
Playscape - pure sandbox, create Dollhouses, fill them with Stuff and Pieces, add Characters and invite your friends to toy together.
Tilebox - platformer with online collaboratie map editor: build, share and play fascinating maps.
Running Race - compete on-foot against other players in random generated maps.
